name: Theme
description: Switch between light and dark mode

command: script=$(find ~/.config/hamr/scripts/colors/switchwall.sh ~/.config/quickshell/scripts/colors/switchwall.sh 2>/dev/null | head -1); [ -x "$script" ] && "$script" --mode light --noswitch || gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.interface color-scheme prefer-light
execute.name: Light Mode

command: script=$(find ~/.config/hamr/scripts/colors/switchwall.sh ~/.config/quickshell/scripts/colors/switchwall.sh 2>/dev/null | head -1); [ -x "$script" ] && "$script" --mode dark --noswitch || gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.interface color-scheme prefer-dark
execute.name: Dark Mode
